alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued May 22 at 2:11PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR MULTIPLE POLLUTANS FROM 200 PM MONDAY UNTIL 1000 PM MONDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Multiple Pollutans. WHERE...Teller and El Paso Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Cripple Creek, Woodland Park, Florissant, Colorado Springs, Manitou Springs, and Monument. WHEN...200 PM Monday May 22 to 1000 PM Monday May 22 IMPACTS...Wildfire smoke has increased both ozone and fine particulate concentrations into the Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups category. Pollutant levels should decrease by late Monday evening as showers and thunderstorms develop over the advisory area. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
